info.description:
One of your friends talked to you about a game in an hidden site on the web. It's a treasure hunt all over the city and the price seems too good to be true. But why not give it a try.
You should have read all the contract of agreement though. Because your life will change forever.

With each hint you hunt, something about you will change, and only the players will notice. Your job, your appareance, your knowledge, nothing seems out of range, and the price of winning a wish seems more and more real.
